sources.name: searchLog
sources.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as timestamp,
		{_col2_} as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as short,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss']) ~> searchLog
